label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_022
content:
## 2024-07-29 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 108
- Active: 95
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 63
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 13

### Enrollment by Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 34
- Standard: 36
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.9
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 27.5
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.8
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 358.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 47.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 28.1
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.3
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.7
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.8
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 2.7
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.3

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.9
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 322.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 43.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.2
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.3

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.7
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.6
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 46.8
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.1
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 277.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 41.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.2
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.9
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.5
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.0

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 216
- Sessions Attended: 188
- Attendance Rate (%): 90.4

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.3
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.8
- WBC (k) Mean: 6.8
- WBC (k) SD: 1.4
- Platelets (k) Mean: 248
- Platelets (k) SD: 44
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.96
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.16
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 102.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 11.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 21.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 7.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2224, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2276, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2209, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2213, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2201, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2220, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Subject retention call completed for 17 overdue visits
- Randomization module updated for new enrollment block
- Subject retention call completed for 22 overdue visits

### Notes
- Week 22: Pain management assessments on track. 108 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
